content.text: Match ends, Stoke City 0, Newcastle United 1.
Second Half ends, Stoke City 0, Newcastle United 1.
Attempt saved. Isaac Hayden (Newcastle United) right footed shot from the centre of the box is saved in the bottom left corner. Assisted by Dwight Gayle.
Attempt missed. Mame Biram Diouf (Stoke City) with an attempt from very close range is too high. Assisted by Charlie Adam with a cross following a corner.

Substitution, Newcastle United. Isaac Hayden replaces Ayoze Pérez.
